Pages.Name: game_ui
Pages.Description: An entity used to override player input when the player is looking at it.

Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.

The amount of tolerance in the view checking when determining whether the player's input is still under control. 1.0 = straight ahead, 0.0 = +/- 90 degrees, -1.0 = all directions. If the player isn't within the tolerance, the player regains control.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: Deactivate
InputOutputs.Description: Return Player Control.

InputOutputs.Name: Activate
InputOutputs.Description: Take Player Control.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerOn
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever this entity starts controlling the player's input.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerOff
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever this entity stops controlling the player's input.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedMoveLeft
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the moveleft key.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedMoveRight
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the moveright key.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedForward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the forward key.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedBack
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the backward key.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedAttack
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the attack key.

InputOutputs.Name: PressedAttack2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player presses the secondary attack key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedMoveLeft
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the moveleft key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedMoveRight
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the moveright key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedForward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the forward key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedBack
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the backward key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedAttack
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the attack key.

InputOutputs.Name: UnpressedAttack2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the player releases the secondary attack key.

InputOutputs.Name: XAxis
InputOutputs.Description: An output that fires whenever the X axis of the player's input changes. i.e. -1 when the player has moveleft key down, 1 when the player has moveright key down, and 0 if neither.

InputOutputs.Name: YAxis
InputOutputs.Description: An output that fires whenever the Y axis of the player's input changes. i.e. -1 when the player has backward key down, 1 when the player has forward key down, and 0 if neither.

InputOutputs.Name: AttackAxis
InputOutputs.Description: An output that fires whenever the state of the player's attack key changes. i.e. 1 when the player has the attack key down, 0 otherwise.

InputOutputs.Name: Attack2Axis
InputOutputs.Description: An output that fires whenever the state of the player's secondary attack key changes. i.e. 1 when the player has the secondary attack key down, 0 otherwise.
